import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import LogoTitle from '../../assets/images/logo-s.png' import './index.scss' const Home = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const nameArray = ['h', 'r', 'i', 's'] const jobArray = [ 'w', 'e', 'b', ' ', 'd', 'e', 'v', 'e', 'l', 'o', 'p', 'e', 'r', '.', ] newFunction() return ( <>

I 'm

Frontend Developer / Javascript, HTML/CSS, React

CONTACT ME
); function newFunction() { useEffect(() => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 4000) }, []) } } export default Home
